ygData.subject: Re: word of possession
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail All I have about 50 emails from this list and a couple others that I didn t look at over the weekend and I was wondering what happened here and if I need
ygData.messageBody:
Hail All
I have about 50 emails from this list and a couple others that I didn't look
at over the weekend and I was wondering what happened here and if I need to
delete them. Thanks
SIlver

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Matthew Tucker [SMTP:tucker_01@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 9:07 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] word of possession
>
> From: "Matthew Tucker" <tucker_01@...>
>
> Listen up gosh darnit! This ISNT a friggin flame fest! If you wish to
> argue with the guy do it privately! I for one read his appology, extremly
>
> mature and polite...yours on the other hand seems more like a child trying
>
> to defend yourself. You were wrong in the assumption that he intentionaly
>
> sent this WORM (not virus), I wonder if you have ever been a net newbie?
> Im
> sure you have...we all have...As he had explained, his son had sent the
> worm...
>
> Give a fellow a break everyonce in a while. The biggest problem with the
> world in general is people like you, quit being an ass and just live a
> little.
>
> If you have any comments send me all the flame and SPAM you wish to:
> tucker_01@...
>
